function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in supply chains","Impact":"Severe disruption of supply chains, shortage of medical supplies, and negative effects on both suppliers and demanders","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, stockpiling of essential medical supplies, and diversification of supply chain sources","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing technologies, and supply chain management software","People":"Supply chain workers, medical professionals, and general population","Owner":"Government agencies, supply chain management companies, and healthcare organizations"}]}
